collection:
This Privacy
Policy outlines our commitment and practices regarding the collection, use,
and protection of your information.

## Data Collection and Usage

We collect the necessary personal data to provide our services, such as your
birth date, time, and place.
sharing:
## Disclosure of Information

As we do not store any personal data beyond the chart calculation process, we
have no information to share or disclose to third parties, except as required
by law.
